role.argrole: thing arg0 is in charge of

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VP (VV 替代) (NP-PN-OBJ (NR 扎加洛))) (VP (QP-ADV (OD 第一) (CLP (M 次))) (VP (VV 执掌) (NP-OBJ (NN 国家队) (NN 教鞭)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 卢森博格))) (VP (PP-MNR (P 按) (NP (DNP (NP (PN 自己)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 定位) (NN 目标)))) (VP (VV 组建) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VA 新))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 国家队))))))
